---
title: "About"
---


My name is __Nadiya Pavlishyn__. In 2015, I graduated __Stony Brook University__ with a B.S. in Applied Math and Statistics, with a double major in Economics. For two years, I worked at __NYU Langone Medical Center__ in research spanning from hospital primary care clinic quality improvement projects to medical education both in a quantitative and qualitative domain.  In September 2017, I began my Master's of Science in Biostatistics at __Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health__ to continue my education as an aspiring biostatistician.
